content.text: 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces
content.eamr: ( ing-0 "4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cut into bite size pieces" )

content.text: 0) In a large pot, put the chopped onion, chicken breast meat, carrots and potatoes.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "put"@19:22 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-1 "the chopped onion"@23:40 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-0 "chicken breast meat"@42:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "carrots"@63:70 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "potatoes"@75:83 / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-0-0 "a large pot"@6:17 / TOOL )
	)
)

( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "Add"@3:6 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the salt"@7:15 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "turmeric"@20:28 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Dissolve the tomato paste in water and add.
3) If desired, add garlic powder and ground black pepper to season.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "add"@15:18 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-8 "garlic powder"@19:32 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:prp ( purp-3-0 "to season"@57:66 / PURPOSE_CLAUSE )
		:ppt ( ing-9 "ground black pepper"@37:56 / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 4) Cook for 1 to 1 1/2 hours on medium low heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Cook"@3:7 / AC
		:duration ( dur-4-0 "1 to 1 1/2 hours"@12:28 / DUR )
		:heat ( temp-4-0 "medium low heat"@32:47 / TEMPERATURE )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)
